title: Child's play (TEFC)
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Child development

description: Shows how mental, social, emotional and physical growth are linked to a child's form of play and how these forms change as the child grows older. Illustrates how play allows children to work out their feelings and frustrations as well as providing a stage for creative ideas and fantasies.
